sentences.en: After escaping at his sixth try, he rejoined the fight as an aviator.
sentences.cn: 经过六次努力后, 他终于成功越狱,作为一名飞行员重新回到战场上.

sentences.en: Air Chief Marshal Glenn Torpy told the graduates: "This is probably one of the most significant milestones in an aviator's career.
sentences.cn: 空军上将格伦•托比在毕业典礼上致辞说：“这可能是飞行员职业生涯中最重要的里程碑之一。

sentences.en: An escort of ten airplanes greets the famous aviator.
sentences.cn: 由10架飞机组成的护航队迎接这位著名的飞行员.
他是一位勇敢的飞行家;

sentences.en: He was designated a Naval Aviator and received his wings in July 1957.
sentences.cn: 他是一名海军飞行员并于1957年获得一枚飞行章.

sentences.en: Hundreds of admirers besieged the famous aviator.
sentences.cn: 数百名爱慕者围困那个著名飞行员.

sentences.en: In fact, the history of aviator jackets can be traced back to the First World War.
sentences.cn: 事实上，飞行员夹克的历史可以追溯到第一次世界大战时期。

sentences.en: John Ed Blackburn: Amarillo aviator died in China in 1942 while serving with the Flying Tigers.
sentences.cn: 约翰·瑞德·布莱克本: 亚马瑞罗飞行员,1942年死于中国,当时服役与飞虎队.

sentences.en: John Ed Blackburn: The Amarillo aviator died in China in 1942 while serving with the Flying Tigers.
sentences.cn: 约翰·德·莱克本: 亚马瑞罗飞行员,1942年死于中国,当时服役与飞虎队.

sentences.en: Like his father, he hopes to become a naval aviator.
sentences.cn: 与父亲一样，他希望成为海军飞行员。

sentences.en: Other hats are inspired by history and fashion, such as the iconic aviator helmet or the cabbie cap which resembles old fashioned "newsboy" hats.
sentences.cn: 其他一些帽子则是受了历史或时尚的启发，比如标志性的飞行员头盔，或是与旧风尚‘报童帽’相似的司机帽。

sentences.en: Scottish aviator Jim Mollison made the first trans - Atlantic solo flight.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰飞行员吉姆·莫里森首次单人驾机飞越大西洋.
那位飞行员驾驶他的飞机.

sentences.en: The aviator warped a wing tip to regain balance.
sentences.cn: 飞行员使一机翼的端部翘起,以恢复平衡.

sentences.en: The final fate of pioneer aviator Amelia Earhart has never been discovered , although theories abound.
sentences.cn: 尽管众说纷纭,但是从来没人知道先驱飞行员阿米莉娅-埃尔哈特的最终命运究竟如何.

sentences.en: The General is an experienced Army Aviator who originally trained as an armor officer.
sentences.cn: 他除了有飞行员和装甲兵的丰富经验,勒克将军还是一名伞兵、巡逻骑兵.

sentences.en: The iconic Aviator a enhanced with a contrasting brow bar.
sentences.cn: 标志性的飞行员是加强与对比的额头吧.

sentences.en: The Man Angel was lighter-than-air and had paddles like a rowboat that the aviator could pump.
sentences.cn: “人类天使”比空气还轻，并且有着类似于小船的桨，飞行员可以驱动这些桨。

sentences.en: The young aviator bragged of his exploits in the sky.
sentences.cn: 那名年轻的飞行员吹嘘他在空中飞行的英勇事迹.

words.tran_cn: 航空；飞行术；飞机制造业
